thread.title: LSU Athletic Director Joe Alleva to get contract extension
thread.title_full: LSU Athletic Director Joe Alleva to get contract extension - FOX 8 WVUE New Orleans News, Weather, Sports, Social

author: cbs8
title: LSU Athletic Director Joe Alleva to get contract extension
text:
BATON ROUGE, La. (AP) - LSU has proposed extending the contract of Athletic Director Joe Alleva by one year to July 2020.
The LSU Board of Supervisors will vote on the proposal at its meeting next Friday.
The Advocate reports ( http://bit.ly/1LeK2cB ) Alleva's proposed extension doesn't include a raise. He currently makes $725,000 with incentives that could push his salary to $900,000.
LSU gave Alleva a three-year extension last September, pushing his deal to July 2019.
Alleva is in his eighth year, coming to Baton Rouge in 2008 after a stint as AD at Duke. He's overseen improvements to Tiger Stadium's exterior and the newly expanded south end zone structure.
Among Alleva's major coaching hires have been men's basketball coaches Trent Johnson and Johnny Jones, women's basketball coach Nikki Caldwell and softball coach Beth Torina.
Information from: The Advocate, http://theadvocate.com
